_json.description: 6 Popular Plot Devices in Storytelling - Learn about the plot devices that have built literature and cinema | From one ring to rule them all to the Holy Grail of Medieval times, join us as we look at 6 pieces of writing inspiration that will keep your characters fighting! | Lord of the Rings | Magic | Harry Potter | Sorcerer's Stone | Mission Impossible | King Arthur | Warrior | King | Knight | Dragon | Mountain | Matrix | Neo | How to write a novel | Novel writing tips | Book writing tips
